metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14749 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: JerryScript 1.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (jmem_heap_alloc_block_internal heap memory corruption) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted .js file, because unrecognized \ characters cause incorrect 0x00 characters in bytecode.literal data.

criterions.comment: iotjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
